((Note I said save those comments for after I lose. Also a ex-player said 
"If a person shows a lot of heart, courage and is willing to go the distance 
even if you get your ass kicked royally if you can pick yourself up dust 
yourself off and go one more round the world is always going to say 
something but its what do you believe?" So in lay mens terms "I don't care 
what you all think there a thousand reason to go back and hide like the rest 
in the Cf he's stronger, he has more Exp. but there always a Thousand and 
one reasons to press on the maximals seem to have forgotten that. I don't 
Judge your actions by my standards and I suggest you don't do the same to me 
please. Because I'll be damned if let your fears control me.))

   ((That pissed me off and makes me more primed to win the fight also all 
Alliance give it all you got now I have something to prove if not  going to 
then don't waste your time and mine challengeing me.))
